description: user at a basic level, needs guidance
name: Level 1 (Foundation)

description: user at a basic level, partially autonomous but sometimes needs appropriate guidance
name: Level 2 (Foundation)

description: autonomous user, can solve straightforward problems
name: Level 3 (Intermediate)

description: independent user, can solve well-defined problems to his or her own needs
name: Level 4 (Intermediate)

description: user can solve more complex problems and explain to others
name: Level 6 (Advanced)

description: user at a highly specialized level
name: Level 7 (Highly specialized)

description: user at the most advanced and highly specialized level
name: Level 8 (Highly specialized)
